This section describes and analyzes the county's existing residential zoning regimen.

```{r}
#| eval: false

zoning <- st_read("data/Rockbridge/RockbridgeZoning20221003.shp", quiet = TRUE) %>% st_transform(4326)

leaflet(zoning) %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addPolygons()
  
```
